name: At Your Service
description:
At Your Service is a wacky and fast paced couch co-cop party game you can play with up to four players. Team up and go on a cleaning frenzy, or go on a solo quest and embrace the tricky job of tidying up weird and wonderful homes throughout the ages any way you can, all while trying to make a clean getaway!



Unique worlds and characters!

Travel through time and work in three unique worlds. From the suburban homes of the 80’s, sci-fi homes of the future, and even a magician’s magic castle! Encounter a unique cast of characters and unlock a growing list of cool and funny playable characters along the way. Experience dads throwing tantrums, daughters setting explosives and even a magician summoning a lightning storm!



Complete the crazy tasks any way you can!!

Whether it be doing the laundry, vacuuming, or coffee making, perform all tasks within a limited time in any way possible… even if it means you must toss or teleport items from one end to the other. Just make sure the owners don’t catch you like you’ll be catching the laundry!
